titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a temporary delay in the requirement to pay certain premiums under the Coal Industry Retiree Health Benefit Act of 1992.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Hearing Held on Issue Prior to Introduction and Referral (Sep 9, 93).

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety.

committee.name: House Education and Labor
committee.subcommittee: Labor Standards, Occupational Health and Safety

bill.summary: 10/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to temporarily defer the payment of premiums to the United Mine Workers of America Combined Benefit Fund.
